dc:description: Light buff clay with worn brown slip.  Semi-circular nozzle extending part way across rim and ending in straight groove with small stamped circle on either side.  Broad rim plain except for small stamped circles flanking base of handle.  Rim separated from discus by band set off by circular grooves.  On discus standing figure (slave) proceeding right holding large amphora before him.  Filling-hole at extreme left of discus.  Ring handle broken, two grooves on upper half.  Circular groove about base.  Stamp, indistinct incised letters.
